content.body: https://github.com/tc39/ecma262/pull/3715 is implemented in JSC and SM (not shipping to stable yet in either); should we merge now? It's making an error into a non-error so no web compat risk I think
Is there a rush? I think I might prefer to be cautious and wait to see if V8 runs into implementation difficulties. I don't expect it, but it's possible.
